PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_VibrationIsolatorTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Vibration isolator type common attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: IsolatorStaticDeflection
PropertyDef.Definition: Static deflection of the vibration isolator.

PropertyDef.Name: IsolatorCompressibility
PropertyDef.Definition: The compressibility of the vibration isolator.

PropertyDef.Name: Height
PropertyDef.Definition: Height of the vibration isolator before tha application of load.

PropertyDef.Name: Material
PropertyDef.Definition: Material from which the damping element of the vibration isolator is constructed.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumSupportedWeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The maximum weight that can be carried by the vibration isolator.
